name: The Other World (KingdomCross)
description:
Controller

Movement by arrows or "A, D, Space" keys

Open door by E key

Story made by one of the other game dev (Story not implemented), "Hiro narasaki was attack by the Akuma the demon of knowledge and trapped in the inverse world of Akuma creation. Also hiro’s girlfriend is handle by the Akuma. Now hiro must fight and solve puzzles to move through  inverse world to rescue his girlfriend."

"The Other World" game was made over the 24 hours game jam event

Made by Four Game devs, KingdomCross, Brett Weston, Anthony Truong, Hiro(Loosey)
